original_text: and had commanded him concerning this thing, that he should not go after other gods. But he did not keep what the Lord commanded.
korean_text: 이 일에 대하여 명령하사 다른 신을 따르지 말라 하셨으나 그가 여호와의 명령을 지키지 않았으므로

sentences.original_text: and had commanded him concerning this thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 일에 관하여 그에게 명령하셨다

sentences.original_text: that he should not go after other gods
But he did not keep what the Lord commanded
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 주께서 명령하신 것을 지키지 않았다
